alert.note: Alert for Benton; Marshall; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 8:09PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Marshall, northwestern Tippah and Benton Counties through 845 PM CST... At 809 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Snow Lake Shores, or 12 miles east of Holly Springs, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Gravestown, Michigan City, Walnut, Hickory Flat, Ashland, Brody, Spring Hill, Higdon, New Canaan, Brownfield, Whitten Town, Pine Grove, Hamilton and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
